channel.title: P.I Questions
channel.description:
1). How would I go about editing a weapons attack speed(how often it hits)? 2). I keep fixing my models yet, whenever I wield a Torva plate with any cape it protrudes the cape in the back. Same issue with Pernix,when wielded with a cape it becomes invisible in the front and the cowl is all messed up.
All help will be appreciated thanks!

item.title: P.I Questions
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

1 combatassistant.java find attack speeds there, there will be a case, then a return, case #### is the item, return ## is the attackspeed. make sure you find the right method though.
2 find a tutorial for adding torva pernix, etc, and copy the models, etc from there. that should fix it

Read full topic
